scene_description_enriched: An elderly man with a long white beard and a red, gold-patterned hat sits on a red chair, writing in an open book. He wears a purple robe with gold trim and a blue, gold-patterned collar. The background is dark brown, suggesting an interior space, with a green canopy-like structure above. The scene likely depicts a prophet or a saint engaged in scholarly or divine work, possibly writing scripture or a theological text.
